name: Kiwi Margarita
description: What do you do when you find yourself with 5 pounds of kiwis? Make margaritas! With a zippy kick-in-the-pants, this is a great new way to enjoy an old favorite.

name: Pulled Pork Grilled Cheese
description: Smoke your own pork roast or use prepared pulled pork for these smoky, cheesy pulled pork sandwiches.

name: Easy Ginger Beef
description: In looking for a healthier version of the standard ginger beef, I came up with this non-deep fried version. The longer you marinate the beef, the more ginger flavor it soaks up.
